title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table does not have a label, so it cannot contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection is not allowed, and the move up/down function can only be applied to one item at a time. The signature preview is not wrapping properly. The signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up/down can be applied on more than one item. The signature preview must wrap text properly. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as hover.
